name: Trigger Time
description: Trigger Time is a story-driven, top-down Shoot 'em up with a fun gravity gun and physics puzzles to solve. Blast your way through 9 levels filled with enemies, hazards and bizarre bosses. Along the way you'll take control of vehicles, pick up weapons, items and boosters.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 2Ghz+ Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: OpenGL compatible card with at least 256MB Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: 2D sound compatible card
